Created attachment 26877
BeanShellError.jmx

in the attached .jmx ,

the "Check CSV File" BeanShell Assertion
sets 'SampleResult.setResponseData("xyz");

in the subsequent "Bsh 2" BeanShell Sampler, the 

   SampleResult.setResponseData(msg);

has no effect, but each time the sampler is called the 

  'SampleResult.setResponseData("xyz"); vorm the Assertion gets into the "Response Data" tab
creator: hauser@acm.org
sebb@apache.org
text: That's because the BSH Assertion is in scope for all the samplers, so it gets applied to them all.

creator: hauser@acm.org
text:
so the conclusion is: if possible always create a simple controller and move the 
BeanShell Assertion
with the 'SampleResult.setResponseData("xyz")

into a child of it - right?
